creator: max@alleged.net
text:
A nice feature would be a way to configure the runtime classloaders 
(specifically the Shared one) to load/monitor other directories in addition to 
or instead of the hardcoded $CATALINA_HOME/lib.  Looking at the code, this 
shouldn't be altogether a difficult change, and I would be willing to write a 
patch.  This change would keep the system classpath out the way to prevent 
silly problems, but still allow some extension mechanism.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
In general, it would be a good idea to try to allow more configuration of the
base classloaders. That alone would make Tomcat a lot more modular.
We would probably need an additional configuration file for that, which would be
used by the Bootstrap classes.
Anyone willing to do that ?

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Remy implemented this ~Oct 2002. It is currently available in 5.5.x, 6.0.x and 7.0.x
